synopsis.text: With the backdrop of pre-World War 2 Japan, the narrative follows the life of Chocchan, a resilient young woman who defies her family's wishes to marry a passionate violinist. Despite living in poverty with three children, Chocchan and her husband find joy in their shared love and face adversity with unwavering smiles. However, their blissful existence is disrupted when the war in the Pacific region erupts, forcing her husband to serve at the front, leaving Chocchan to endure the uncertainty of his return. This heartwarming tale is inspired by the real-life story of Cho 'Chocchan' Kuroyanagi, the mother of renowned actress Tetsuko Kuroyanagi.
